product_name: Spark R&D Low Rider Heel Loop Kit - Extra Small
long_description: Sized for smaller riders, the extra-small Spark R&D Low Rider Heel Loop Kit features shorter loops to position the highbacks on your bindings lower on your legs for better calf fit and comfort.
short_description: Sized for smaller riders, the extra-small Spark R&D Low Rider Heel Loop Kit features shorter loops to position the highbacks on your bindings lower on your legs for better calf fit and comfort.
